search.query: (index=windows) (sourcetype=XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational EventID=1 OR sourcetype=WinEventLog:Security EventCode=4688) | eval img=coalesce(Image, NewProcessName) | search img="*\\certutil.exe" OR img="*\\mshta.exe" OR img="*\\rundll32.exe" OR img="*\\regsvr32.exe" OR img="*\\installutil.exe" OR img="*\\msbuild.exe" | timechart span=1h count

(index=windows) (sourcetype=XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational EventID=1 OR sourcetype=WinEventLog:Security EventCode=4688) | eval cmd=coalesce(CommandLine, Message, _raw) | search cmd="* -urlcache*" OR cmd="*http://*" OR cmd="*https://*" OR cmd="*javascript:*" OR cmd="*scrobj.dll*" OR cmd="*/i:http*" | table _time host user cmd | sort - _time
